a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Value of 1 tonne of tungstenยน, in constant 1998 US$ per tonne.
Data source: USGS - Historical Statistics for Mineral and Material Commodities (2023)
Note: This data is adjusted for inflation.
1. Tungsten: Tungsten is a mineral that is used in consumer electronics, semiconductors, medical equipment, light bulbs, furnaces and other
applications where low thermal expansion is useful.
